#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
	int t,n,a[105],sum;
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(n);
		sum=0;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			sc(a[i]);
			sum+=(a[i])/i;
		}
		if(sum&1)
		{
			printf("ALICE\n");
		}
		else
		{
			printf("BOB\n");
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
